reviews.review:
Inconsistent, unmotivated and sloppy writing.
People make choices that nobody with these stakes on the table would make.Just to keep the plot moving. The motivation for this stupidity is poor. The battle scene makes no sense from a military strategic point of view either.
Visually stunning except for the comps of Banner in Hulk Smasher and some environment comps. But generally visually stunning.
Avoid the internet and go see it. You DO NOT want this spoiled.

A truly monumental film balanced around the main villain Thanos. Overall Infinity War leaves the audience in awe and ready for another installment. Seeing these character interactions is truly a sight to see making Infinity War by far the best Avengers film in my opinion.

For 10 years we have been emotionally attached to the super heroes. Our love for the characters drives us for more. Infinity War is the movie that proves regardless how super the characters are they are still mortal. Thanos proves that with a snap of a finger our beloved heroes can just vanish. The movie gives you the feeling of lost and hope but yet you cling on that small faith that they will prevail. Definately an emotional roller coaster that breaks the mold. Exciting, upsetting, crazy and entertaining. Elements that makes this movie 5 stars. Watch it for the beloved heroes.
It's fresh to watch. MCU really made me overwhelming!
Stellar movie - amazing pacing, balancing a huge plot and a massive cast of great characters. The humor made it even more fun and relatable.

The Result of hard work and creative minds of the Russo Brothers gives us this stunning third installment of the Avengers. With it's beautiful special effects, hilarious character interactions and cluster of dramatic moments that will leave you hanging on the edge of your seat, Avengers: Infinity War is the one movie that you would NOT want to miss. A must see!

Avengers Infinity War punched me in the gut in the first five minutes, had me guffawing five minutes later, made me cheer and scream and cry more than once... It's less of a film, when you're so invested in these characters, and more of an experience. I'm traumatised with happiness. Next year can't come soon enough.
